Title: 12 - Automated Layout of Trees
Tip: Create a class that 'wraps' a shape and orchestrates that arrangement of layout of horizontal and vertical trees

Summary.What: Lots of drawings are based on trees or shapes, layout is a very common problem
Summary.Why: Your users should spend their time thinking about the relationships between the component shapes
Summary.How: Use the class FoLayoutTree<V>, to build a tree from your target shapes

Samples.Tip: Use a generic class to capture your shape relationships
Samples.Title: FoLayoutTree<V> - Horizontal Tree
